@aaronra159 Me and Etta James singing Waiting for Charlie and then Charlie Ain't Home!

@abbyb389 LA can be ruthless but find a great group of creatives and stick with them. They can very supportive!
@j_parks1215 my suitcase! I'm packing for a show in DC tomorrow. I always see my suitcase haha
@victoriashianne good question! But hard question! it changes all the time. Right now I would say Charlie

text: @ashalia91 No i don't think so
@stickshiftkinng she was so talented. Such a tragic loss. I loved her music
@outwitthedevil i think NSYNC but I loved BSB too
@bdlandshood The Beatles.
@30camdensquare Yes I played at @thehotelcafe and Room 5 a lot. I love seeing bands at both venues still
@creatinjustin @toughzz Randy Savage vs Hulk Hogan! Don't know if that actually happened but I know those wrestlers lol
@uconndan1 usually the green room in her airport bag
@daveboston8 i know. I'm sorry. We will come back for sure and to Detroit soon too!
@nadiyaclarke bad.
@nickcalidonna No i haven't but that sounds cool! what is it?
@bdlandshood YES! We're working out the details now. If not before the end of the year definitely the top of next year
@logan32 haha yes i do and thats so cool!
@j_parks1215 I LOVE meet and greets. I get a chance to meet so many of you that I only know through social media. It's very special
@nickcalidonna strawberry fasho!
@abbyb389 Just go for it! I moved to LA which was so scary and threw myself completely into my music. Found people who believed in me too!
@alexkactus Yes they will be very soon! I think early August?
@zzward_pics I've only been to Toronto and Vancouver and its too hard to pick between the two!!! I can't wait to visit Montreal sometime!
@meowsloan it's a secret!!! I'd tell you but I'd have to‚Ä¶.lol
@meowsloan Totally! I love that song so much but I can't play them all. I spend a lot of time working on set flow and it didn't fit this one
@30camdensquare No. I only want to collaborate with someone when I feel like the song needs it and OverdoZZe was the only one calling for it
@heyheyloretta For sure Muddy! I would let her win because I LOVE HER!
@outwitthedevil I have no idea! I don't want to be anything else
@tcatinella My Dad was and still is my biggest inspiration!!! I love him so much
@ihannahjohnson I'm trying to right now while I do this chat haha. I'm leaving soon fro DC!
@heidiv21 Hi Heidi. You too! xo
@victoriarice_ I eat rainbows and drink perfection Kool Aid LOL
